titleStmt.title: For the holy women that trust in God and do profess godliness with good works, according to the Apostle's doctrine in this age to read over and put in practice.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: G.F. [i.e. George Fox]. The 9th of the 5th month 1686.
"Concerning children and young people" has caption title on p. 6.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
